StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMonthlyNWARpt]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Year varchar(4), @Month varchar(2), @RecruiterId uniqueidentifier = null, @OrgId int AS BEGIN
-- Get all Nwa Graduates SELECT DISTINCT n.rowguid AS NwaId, n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, p.LAST_NAME, p.FIRST_NAME, n.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, hs.HIGHSCHOOL_NAME, e.Educa.on_Code, p2.LAST_NAME AS RECRUITER_LAST_NAME, rp.Rank_Code, rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, e.EDUCATION_LEVEL, e.SCHOOL_CODE, e.Update_Date INTO #NwaGraduate FROM MCRISS.dbo.Nwa n INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Recrui.ng_Person AS rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.Person p on p.person_Id = n.Marine_Candidate_id inner join MCRISS.DBO.Person AS p2 ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=p2.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.Candidate_Educa.on e on e.Marine_Candidate_id = n.Marine_Candidate_id INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.High_School hs on hs.School_Code = e.School_Code INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs on cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID WHERE (rp.rowguid=@RecruiterID or @RecruiterID is null) AND (rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID) AND (YEAR(n.NWA_DECLARED_DATE)=@Year) AND (MONTH (n.NWA_DECLARED_DATE) = @Month) AND e.Educa.on_Code NOT IN ('H','M','S') and e.Update_Date = (SELECT max(e2.update_date) FROM MCRISS.DBO.Candidate_Educa.on e2 WHERE e2.Marine_Candidate_id = e.Marine_Candidate_id AND e2.Marine_Candidate_id = e.Marine_Candidate_id ) AND cs.STATUS_CODE = 'A' AND (CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'F' OR CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'DH')
-- Get all Nwa Seniors SELECT DISTINCT n.rowguid AS NwaId, n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, p.LAST_NAME, p.FIRST_NAME, n.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, hs.HIGHSCHOOL_NAME, e.Educa.on_Code, p2.LAST_NAME AS RECRUITER_LAST_NAME, rp.Rank_Code, rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, e.EDUCATION_LEVEL, e.SCHOOL_CODE, e.Update_Date INTO #NwaSenior FROM MCRISS.dbo.Nwa n INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Recrui.ng_Person AS rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.Person p on p.person_Id = n.Marine_Candidate_id inner join MCRISS.DBO.Person AS p2 ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=p2.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.Candidate_Educa.on e on e.Marine_Candidate_id = n.Marine_Candidate_id INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.High_School hs on hs.School_Code = e.School_Code INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs on cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID WHERE (rp.rowguid=@RecruiterID or @RecruiterID is null) AND (rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID) AND (YEAR(n.NWA_DECLARED_DATE)=@Year) AND (MONTH (n.NWA_DECLARED_DATE) = @Month) AND e.Educa.on_Code IN ('H','M','S') AND e.EDUCATION_LEVEL = '11' and e.Update_Date = (SELECT max(e2.update_date) FROM MCRISS.DBO.Candidate_Educa.on e2 WHERE e2.Marine_Candidate_id = e.Marine_Candidate_id AND e2.Marine_Candidate_id = e.Marine_Candidate_id ) AND cs.STATUS_CODE = 'A' AND (CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'F' OR CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'DH')
-- Select all Nwa graduates SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), n.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, 106) [Date], n.Last_name + ', ' + n.First_Name [Name], t.Area_Code + '-' + t.Telephone_Number [Telephone], 'GR' AS [Educa.on Level], n.HighSchool_Name [School], n.Rank_Code + ' ' + n.Recruiter_Last_name [Recruiter], pro.Source [Source], pro.Ac.vity [Ac.vity], pro.ProspectId, pro.NWAID FROM #NwaGraduate AS n le. outer join Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pro on pro.NWAID = n.NwaId le. outer join MCRISS.DBO.Candidate_Telephone t on t.Marine_Candidate_id = n.Marine_Candidate_id AND t.Telephone_Type='C'
UNION
-- Select all Nwa Seniors SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), n.NWA_DECLARED_DATE, 106) [Date], n.Last_name + ', ' + n.First_Name [Name], t.Area_Code + '-' + t.Telephone_Number [Telephone], 'SR' AS [Educa.on Level], n.HighSchool_Name [School], n.Rank_Code + ' ' + n.Recruiter_Last_name [Recruiter], pro.Source [Source], pro.Ac.vity [Ac.vity], pro.ProspectId, pro.NWAID FROM #NwaSenior AS n le. outer join Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pro on pro.NWAID = n.NwaId le. outer join MCRISS.DBO.Candidate_Telephone t on t.Marine_Candidate_id = n.Marine_Candidate_id AND t.Telephone_Type='C'
ORDER BY [Date] DESC
DROP TABLE #NwaGraduate DROP TABLE #NwaSenior
END
